text: The 2012 Ukrainian Super Cup became the ninth edition of Ukrainian Super Cup, an annual football match contested by the winners of the previous season's Ukrainian Top League and Ukrainian Cup competitions. The match was played at the Avanhard Stadium, Luhansk, on 10 July 2012, and contested by league winner Shakhtar Donetsk and cup runner-up Metalurh Donetsk.
